nodes.text: An ion-charged dishrag was one of the cleaning tool created from the template of the vibromop. Ion-charged dishrags were considered new and exciting.

Ion-charged dishrags were mentioned in the Codex entry for the History of the Vibro-mop in the 2015 expansion Knights of the Fallen Empire to the 2011 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare.
